TopicTitle: looking for an iss like space station save [STOCK]

Articles.Content:
Hi i would like a save with an iss like space station so i can recreate real space craft that went there and make my own. I would like it at a 200km orbit at 0 inclination.

i will keep you guys updated and do and all missions will be posted on a thread here thanks guys.

Hi i would like a save with an iss like space station so i can recreate real space craft that went there and make my own. I would like it at a 200km orbit at 0 inclination.

i will keep you guys updated and do and all missions will be posted on a thread here thanks guys.

You know, the real ISS is at an inclination of 51.6 degrees!

Problem with nice ISS like stations is that they lag like a *BLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLEEEEEEEEEEEEEP*.

Here is a nice parts pack that has all you need to make a station similar... http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kosmos-tks-spacecraft/

yes i did know it was inclined but i didn't think it was that much but i wanted to make it easy for me to get to and have you seen nasa's spot the station i have and i have seen the REAL thing. and I'm running a late 2011 15" mac laptop

Edited May 16, 2013 by Silver Eagle

yes i did know it was inclined but i didn't think it was that much but i wanted to make it easy for me to get to and have you seen nasa's spot the station i have and i have seen the REAL thing. and I'm running a late 2011 15" mac laptop

Yeah, that's completely understandable, I just seen the opportunity to mention a little fun fact.
